subject: Simsonn VAM PRO question
description_text:
Hi. I just wanted to know that if i get only haptic motor and PSU, will i
be able to mount it w\o getting 2 or 3 pack? And do I need to get extra
control box to use haptics?

conversations.body_text: Hi bubub,    Sure, purchasing haptics includes the corresponding number of mounting brackets. You can buy haptic separately and purchase a power supply additionally.  If you're not using Plus X or Pro X Ultra pedals, you'll need to purchase an additional Plus X control box.

Thank you for the clarification. Hoping to get Plus X by the new year!

сб, 27 сент. 2025 г. в 14:15, service@simsonn.com
Okay, thank you for your support. Also, if you'd like to get it early, feel free to reach out to me for a special discount.
